entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon then light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
